properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\addinutil.exe" and (not((FolderPath endswith ":\\Windows\\System32\\conhost.exe" or FolderPath endswith ":\\Windows\\System32\\werfault.exe" or FolderPath endswith ":\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\werfault.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects uncommon child processes of the Add-In deployment cache updating utility (AddInutil.exe) which could be a sign of potential abuse of the binary to proxy execution via a custom Addins.Store payload.
